attributes.action: create slow and fast lanes on pavements, in city centres, during busy periods of the year (e.g. Christmas)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Some pedestians are not as fast as others either because they are disabled, pushing prams or choose to wander past the shops at their own leisure. Others are in a hurry because they have an appointment or are on a lunch break etc... Having fast and slow lanes would make things easier for everyone. (The slow lane would be next to the shops).
